text.section: The board shall hold at least four (4) regular meetings each year. Special meetings shall be held if the bylaws provide. Notice of all meetings shall be given in the manner provided by the bylaws.
Six (6) members shall constitute a quorum.

law.history: Amended 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 214, sec. 25, effective January 1, 1999. -- Amended 1986 Ky. Acts ch. 291, sec. 24, effective July 15, 1986. -- Amended 1972 Ky. Acts ch. 148, sec. 21. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 1599e-7.
